description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nBloodbath:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, the target is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED} and this creature has a 25% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1984]Hemorrhage on each enemy that already has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLEED}.
name: Mannequin Blade
